feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-16T14:02:22.080257Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;我从两年的高中 CS 教学中学到了什么</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.charliemeyer.co/what-i-learned-from-two-years -of-teaching-high-school-cs/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T13:00:33.426152Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.charliemeyer.co/what-i -learned-from-two-years-of-teaching-high-school-cs/"/>; <author>; <name>;csmeyer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= csmeyer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;在过去的两年里，我与 200 多名学生一起工作，对许多人来说，我的课程是他们第一次体验编码。当我离开教学开始 Pickcode 时，我主要关心的是如何设计产品以吸引更多学生。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-i-learned-from-two-years-of-teaching-high-school-cs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36355172" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;每个工程师都应该知道的烦人的 A/B 测试错误</stitle>; <id>;https://posthog.com/blog/ ab-testing-mistakes</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T11:00:33.428147Z</updated>; <link href="https://posthog.com/blog/ab-testing-mistakes"/>; <作者>; <name>;Twixes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Twixes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://posthog.com/og-images/blogab-testing-mistakes.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;A/B 测试中的第一个常见错误是在您的实验中包含实际不受您正在测试的更改影响的用户。它会稀释您的实验结果，使您更难确定更改的影响。另一个错误是没有将结果分解成子组，这可能会导致丢失重要的见解。最后，在没有决定应该持续多长时间的情况下开始实验可能会导致问题，例如过早结束实验或等待结果的时间过长。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#annoying-ab-testing-mistakes-every-engineer-should-know" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354280" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;监狱国际象棋俱乐部帮助改造囚犯</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-england-hereford-worcester- 65889955</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T12:00:33.430747Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-england-hereford-worcester-65889955"/ >; <作者>; <name>;mellosouls</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mellosouls</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/976/cpsprodpb/146C9/production/_130075638_dsc_0006.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;国际象棋如何帮助 HMP Hewell 的囚犯重建信心。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#prison-chess-clubs-helping-rehabilitate-inmates" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338853" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;DevOps 是废话（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.massdriver.cloud/posts/devops-is-bullshit/</id>; <updated >;2023-06-16T11:00:33.431750Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.massdriver.cloud/posts/devops-is-bullshit/"/>; <作者>; <name>;dijit</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dijit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.massdriver.cloud /posts/devops-is-bullshit/devops-is-bullshit.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：150px；" />;<br />;DevOps 已经退化为部门和隧道愿景，团队使用 Terraform 和 YAML 来完成琐碎的任务。组织需要转向平台工程并支持开发人员自助服务。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#devops-is-bullshit-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36354049" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;Jane Street 的《概率与市场》[pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.janestreet.com/static/pdfs/trading-interview.pdf</id>; <updated >;2023-06-16T11:00:33.432159Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.janestreet.com/static/pdfs/trading-interview.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;max_< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=max_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章介绍了概率和市场，强调了重要性在我们的日常生活中理解这些概念。它解释了随机性和概率在决策中的作用，并讨论了不同情况下概率的计算。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#probability-and-markets-by-jane-street-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354259" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Rash – 鲁莽的球拍外壳</stitle>; <id>;https://rash-lang.org</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T09： 00:33.432819Z</updated>; <link href="https://rash-lang.org"/>; <author>; <name>;nrabulinski</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=nrabulinski</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://rash-lang.org/rash-logo-blinking.gif" style="width: 220px;高度：144px；" />;<br />;Rash 结合了简单的类 shell 语法的便利性和成熟的编程语言 Racket 的强大功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rash-the-reckless-racket-shell" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36323457" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;OpenSSL 1.1.1 生命周期即将结束</stitle>; <id>;https://www.openssl.org/blog/blog/2023/06/15/1.1.1- EOL-提醒/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T08:00:33.433593Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.openssl.org/blog/blog/2023/06/15/ 1.1.1-EOL-Reminder/"/>; <author>; <name>;gslin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gslin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;OpenSSL 1.1.1 系列将于 2023 年 9 月 11 日结束生命周期 (EOL)。OpenSSL 1.1.1 的用户应考虑他们的选择并计划他们可能需要采取的任何行动。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openssl-1-1-1-end-of-life-approaching" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36352547" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;放一个io_uring——利用Linux内核</stitle>; <id>;https://chompie.rip/Blog+Posts/Put+an+ io_uring+on+it+-+Exploiting+the+Linux+Kernel</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T10:00:33.434007Z</updated>; <link href="https://chompie.rip/Blog+帖子/Put+an+io_uring+on+it+-+Exploiting+the+Linux+Kernel"/>; <author>; <name>;fragmede</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =fragmede</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;在上面放一个 io_uring - 利用 Linux 内核 - chompie <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#put -an-io-uring-on-it-exploiting-the-linux-kernel" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36353845" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;LiveView 是一个进程</stitle>; <id>;https://fly.io/phoenix-files/a-liveview-is-a-process/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T11 :00:33.437453Z</updated>; <link href="https://fly.io/phoenix-files/a-liveview-is-a-process/"/>; <author>; <name>;clessg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=clessg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://fly.io/phoenix-files /2023-06-14/process-cover.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;LiveView 是一个进程，它接收事件，更新其状态，并将更新作为差异呈现到页面。LiveView 与其他前端框架的不同之处在于它是一个进程，而不是一个操作系统进程或线程。Elixir 和 Erlang 中的进程轻量级且廉价，它们按顺序执行代码，一次处理一条消息。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-liveview-is -a-process" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36339891" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 似乎正在恢复已编辑/删除的评论< /stitle>; <id>;https://kbin.social/m/RedditMigration/t/34112/Heads-up-Reddit-is-quietly-restoring-deleted-AND-overwritten-posts-and</id>; <更新>; 2023-06-16T12:00:33.437873Z</updated>; <link href="https://kbin.social/m/RedditMigration/t/34112/Heads-up-Reddit-is-quietly-restoring-deleted-AND -overwritten-posts-and"/>; <author>; <name>;kaimac</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kaimac</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<img src="https://kbin.social/media/cache/resolve/post_thumb/f5/11/f511e6bb9570e74f911e17d30d6b6b6ac0524b0fc706b75cd0abf8fd67f83430.png" style="width: 220px; height: 184px;" />;<br />;Reddit 似乎正在恢复编辑/删除的评论。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reddit-appears-to-be-restoring-edited-deleted -comments" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354850" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;从 kCTF VRP 的 42 个 Linux 内核漏洞提交中学习</stitle >; <id>;https://security.googleblog.com/2023/06/learnings-from-kctf-vrps-42-linux.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T04:00:33.438277Z</已更新>; <link href="https://security.googleblog.com/2023/06/learnings-from-kctf-vrps-42-linux.html"/>; <author>; <name>;tim_sw</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tim_sw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.gstatic.com/images/branding /googlelogo/2x/googlelogo_color_150x54dp.png" style="width: 220px; height: 80px;" />;<br />;从 kCTF VRP 的 42 个 Linux 内核漏洞提交中学习 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#learnings-from-kctf-vrp-s- 42-linux-kernel-exploits-submissions" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350693" target="_blank">; [评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Localrf – 来自休闲的 Nerf摇晃的视频</stitle>; <id>;https://localrf.github.io/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T00:00:33.438676Z</updated>; <link href="https://localrf .github.io/"/>; <author>; <name>;smusamashah</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=smusamashah</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;我们在优化辐射场的同时逐步添加帧并估计它们的姿势。局部辐射场在整个过程中动态分配。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#localrf-nerf-from-casual-抖动视频" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36348483" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我 24 岁的 HP Jornada 可以做 iPhone 的事情仍然做不到</stitle>; <id>;https://raymii.org/s/blog/My_24_year_old_HP_Jornada_can_do_things_your_modern_iPhone_still_cant_do.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T21:00:33.439902Z</updated>; <link href="https://raymii.org/s/blog/My_24_year_old_HP_Jornada_can_do_things_your_modern_iPhone_still_cant_do.html"/>; <author>; <name>;jandeboevrie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jandeboevrie </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raymii.org/s/inc/img/jornada-1.JPG" style="width: 220px; height: 175px;" />;<br />;1999 年发布的 HP Jornada 720 是一款运行 Windows CE 或 Linux 的小型掌上电脑。它有 C 和 C++ 编译器、Python 和 Perl，使其成为一个成熟的开发工作站。与现代 iPhone 不同，它允许您在设备上开发、编译和运行本机软件。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-24-year-old-hp-jornada -can-do-things-an-iphone-still-can-t-do" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36346254" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;Diablo Pitch Document (1994) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;http://www.graybeardgames.com/download/diablo_pitch.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T00:00： 33.440309Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.graybeardgames.com/download/diablo_pitch.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;bpierre</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=bpierre</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#diablo-pitch-document-1994-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36348356" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;从开源中创收</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /vadimdemedes.com/posts/generating-income-from-open-source</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T01:00:33.440708Z</更新>; <link href="https://vadimdemedes.com/ posts/generating-income-from-open-source"/>; <author>; <name>;farazzz</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=farazzz</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://vadimdemedes.com/og/posts/generating-income-from-open-source.png" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Ink 是一个开源项目，正在寻找产生收入和支持进一步发展的方法。个人捐赠是不够的，企业不太可能出于善意捐赠。开源项目应该根据他们为公司提供的价值收费。建立在开源基础上的成功企业使用不同的方法来产生收入，例如提供不同的许可证、分层定价计划或开源和付费版本的组合。<a href="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/#generating-income-from-open-source" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36349208" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Reddit 正在删除通过将其社区私有化来抗议的版主</stitle>; <id>;https://old.reddit.com/r/ModCoord/comments/14aeq5j/new_admin_post_if_a_moderator_team_unanimously/</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-16T04:00:33.441474Z</updated>; <link href="https://old.reddit.com/r/ModCoord/comments/14aeq5j/new_admin_post_if_a_moderator_team_unanimously/"/>; <author>; <name>;Jimmc414</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Jimmc414</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://external-preview.redd.它/4QG8xCazO9IE7CYVQd7M4ICpETI2Xj_tbos4K5p6_8o.png?width=1024&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=c35722975acbc564f2f4d2bb802c3fe55dbf2ff5" style="width: 220px; height: 100px;" />;<br />;没有修改过的普通用户不知道需要什么，因此在很大程度上不知道它直接影响到他们或被他们看到。并非所有版主都是天使但总的来说，无论规模大小，那些创建了可持续、持久社区的人都在做正确的事情，而 Reddit 的整个用户群通常看不到和低估了长时间、几个月和几年的维护、照顾和喂养。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reddit-is-removing-moderators-that-protest-by-taking-their-communities-private" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350938" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;伊利诺伊州医院在勒索软件攻击后率先关闭</stitle>; <id>;https://www.techdirt.com/2023/06 /16/illinois-hospital-first-to-shut-down-completely-after-ransomware-attack/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T13:00:33.441845Z</updated>; <link href="https ://www.techdirt.com/2023/06/16/illinois-hospital-first-to-shut-down-completely-after-ransomware-attack/"/>; <author>; <name>;xoa</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=xoa</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.techdirt.com/wp-内容/主题/techdirt/assets/images/footer-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 181px;" />;<br />;伊利诺斯州斯普林瓦利的圣玛格丽特医院在 2021 年遭受勒索软件攻击后被迫完全关闭。这次攻击使医院无法向保险公司、医疗保险或医疗补助计划提交索赔，导致金融螺旋上升。这种关闭在已经服务不足的地区造成了巨大的医疗真空。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#illinois-hospital-first-to-shut-down-after-ransomware -attack" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36355551" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Trsvid，TRS-80 Model 1 的视频播放器， 3 和 4</stitle>; <id>;http://48k.ca/trsvid.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T04:00:33.442236Z</updated>; <link href="http:/ /48k.ca/trsvid.html"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这是一个 trsvid 的视频：你看到的是每秒 60 帧的全屏视频。好吧，在 Model 4 上。Model III 的处理速度刚刚超过 54 帧/秒，而 Model I 的处理速度刚刚超过 51 帧/秒。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trsvid-a-video-player-for-trs-80-model-1-3-and-4" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350789" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;二甲双胍显示可预防长期 Covid</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cidrap.umn.edu/ covid-19/common-diabetes-drug-shown-prevent-long-covid</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T03:00:33.442963Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cidrap .umn.edu/covid-19/common-diabetes-drug-shown-prevent-long-covid"/>; <author>; <name>;sp332</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=sp332</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.cidrap.umn.edu/sites/default/files/styles/article_detail/public/article /Older%20woman%20taking%20a%20white%20pill.jpg?itok=paYdNBhn" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;既往感染与 COVID-19 检测呈阴性显着相关，而柏林私人住宿的感染率高于酒店住宿。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#metformin-shown-to-prevent-long-covid" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350280" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;历史计算机的详细微型模型</stitle>; <id>;https://www.miniatua.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T05:00 :33.443322Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.miniatua.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;zwieback</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=zwieback</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.miniatua.com/work/wopr/img/small_preview.jpg" style="宽度： 220 像素；高度：147 像素；" />;<br />;非常详细的收藏品和手工制作的微型比例模型 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#detailed-miniature-models-of-historic-computer" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36351041" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;软件工作量估算主要是虚假研究（2021 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://shape- of-code.com/2021/01/17/software-effort-estimation-is-mostly-fake-research/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T00:00:33.443717Z</updated>; <link href ="https://shape-of-code.com/2021/01/17/software-effort-estimation-is-mostly-fake-research/"/>; <author>; <name>;greghn</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=greghn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;工作量估算是任何项目、软件或其他方面的重要组成部分。然而，软件工程的研究人员在获取现实估计数据方面受到限制，导致使用了小而过时的数据集。机器学习技术在软件工程研究中已成为一种趋势，但研究人员通常依赖于 1980 年代至 90 年代的微小数据集，而不是利用更大、更相关的数据集。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#software-effort-estimation-is-mostly-fake-research-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36348007" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;WinFsp · Windows 文件系统代理</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/winfsp/winfsp</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-16T00:00:33.444112Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/winfsp/winfsp"/>; <author>; <name>;mariuz</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=mariuz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/winfsp/winfsp/master/art/winfsp -glow.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;WinFsp 使开发人员能够将自己的文件系统编写为 Windows 计算机上的用户模式程序。它为自定义文件系统提供开发和运行时支持，允许通过标准 Windows 文件 API 访问信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#winfsp-windows-file-system-proxy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36322233" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;停止称每次新灾难为“新常态”</stitle>; <id>;https://thewalrus.ca/stop-calling-each-new-disaster-the-new-正常/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T11:00:33.444488Z</更新>; <link href="https://thewalrus.ca/stop-calling-each-new-disaster-the-new- normal/"/>; <author>; <name>;伪</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://walrus-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/img/Kopecky_NewNormal_1800.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;“新常态”一词已经成为陈词滥调，已经失去了惊吓和唤起人们的力量。它已经被标准化，连同它所描述的事物，例如气候变化。强大的利益集团，如石油巨头，告诉我们要“习惯它”而不是采取行动。语言在引导我们的注意力和激发行动方面很重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stop-calling-each-new-disaster-the-new-normal" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354358" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 OCaml 中玩 Atari 游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://www.janestreet.com/tech-talks/playing-atari-games-in -ocaml/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T06:00:33.445134Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.janestreet.com/tech-talks/playing-atari-games-in -ocaml/"/>; <author>; <name>;lnyan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lnyan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://www.janestreet.com/static/img/share-image.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了如何使用机器学习来玩 Atari 游戏，特别是使用 OCaml。它涵盖了监督学习的概念和构建分类器的挑战。本文还介绍了 PyTorch，这是一个可在 OCaml 中用于机器学习任务的张量库。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#playing-atari-games-in-ocaml" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36336519" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
